column3: My whole damn family was nice. I don't think I've imagined it. It's true. Maybe it has to do with being brought up as Christian Scientists. Half of my relatives were Readers or Practitioners in the church.
I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.

I grew up in a very religious family. I could read the Qu'ran easily at the age of five.
